website_summaries.verdict: Though it make take a little time and effort to apply perfectly due to some quirks with the tube and brush, the mascara itself produces attractive, lasting results.
pros: Garners enthusiasm for its all-day wear that resists fading and smudging
Makes lashes "pop" with dark, dramatic color
Helps to separate and lengthen lashes
cons: The brush tends to hold too much mascara, making it a bit tedious to apply
Tube stopper has been known to dislocate or fall out

customer_reviews.title: Clearly not new ... mascara wasn’t even in original packaging.
customer_reviews.text: I’ve heard great things about this mascara, but when I got it from here it didn’t come in a box but rather in a sandwich bag and the tube itself looks like it had been sitting in a makeup bag for a few months (the metallic coating is coming off, etc) clearly not new. Kind of grossed out. Thank God I can return it. Careful who you buy from.
customer_reviews.author: Ann Lindquist

customer_reviews.title: FAKE product
customer_reviews.text: This is a fake. Irritates my eyes and is super runny when applying then sticky every time you blink your eyes. Don't waste your money.
customer_reviews.author: Chance

customer_reviews.title: Fake imitation product!
customer_reviews.text: This is a fake! The mascara is visibly sticky and not right. The feeling of the actual mascara tube is different. The brush is also different. I use this mascara everyday and i know the difference. I first used it thinking it was a new version. Mascara ran. I went to Ulta bought a new one- it is a total fake product. See differences in tubes are slight.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: FAKE
customer_reviews.text: This product is a fake. I've been using this mascara for years, I've ordered it from Amazon before with success. This last time, the mascara I received wasn't the same as the genuine mascara. It was clearly a different formula. The real mascara has fibers and rinses of easily, this fake was like black cement on my eyes. It took a gallon of eye makeup remover to get it off. It was thick and clumpy and sticky. It was either a terrible fake or severely damaged. Do NOT buy. Get it from Ulta for the same price.
customer_reviews.author: Hope

customer_reviews.title: meh.
customer_reviews.text: The product looked very different than the one I purchased at Ulta...the writing on this mascara was lighter and the mascara consistency was super stringy and it smelled like some kind of perfume. All I know is that mascara isn't stringy and thick like this so I just don't know about this mascara. I will just buy from the actual Benefit site or at Ulta. I want to believe that this is a real mascara from Benefit cosmetics but....no, I don't think it is.
customer_reviews.author: gloridayes

customer_reviews.title: It doesn’t own up to the description and all
customer_reviews.text: This mascara is awful. It doesn’t even put mascara on my eyelashes it’s like a dried-up piece of mascara wand. I will never order this again. I have benefit mascara that’s really good it’s the one that’s for bad girls or somethin it doesn’t even put mascara on my eyelashes it’s like a dried-up piece of mascara wand. I will never order this again And I’m going to return it.
customer_reviews.author: Gift Recipient

customer_reviews.title: Best Falsie Substitute EVER
customer_reviews.text: If you are like me and can't afford to keep up on lash extensions year round, this is an excellent filler. When I take a break from lash extensions, this is the mascara I use. $20+ seems steep for mascara, but when you think about the savings from not having lash extensions, it's much easier to justify. The ONLY complaint I have is that each tube seems to not last me very long... I very rarely am able to get a full month out of one tube, but, that could be a personal problem ;) All in all, it's worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Have used it for years. Really extends my lashes ...
customer_reviews.text: Have used it for years. Really extends my lashes. - Update: I ordered this again and was VERY disappointed...Benefit has changed the brush. It's awful, almost impossible to do your lower lashes without getting mascara everywhere. I am heartbroken.
customer_reviews.author: G Unit

customer_reviews.title: THIS PRODUCT IS A FAKE
customer_reviews.text: I have been using this mascara for years. I love it! I was in a pinch and thought I'd order thru Amazon because I needed it quickly and couldn't get to the store. The product brush is different, the mascara itself does not dry for a very long time and it made my eyes burn. It also kept leaving black specs above and below my eyes when I would blink. Definitely NOT a BENEFIT product!
customer_reviews.author: Linda Boschetti-Price

customer_reviews.title: Terrible product
customer_reviews.text: I have used this brand for several years now and typically buy from Ulta. I thought I might save a couple dollars and order through Amazon, bad idea! Product is stringy and does NOT fill out the eyelashes like the product from Ulta. Save your dollar and head to Ulta.
customer_reviews.author: Marilyn Haught-Masi

customer_reviews.title: Favorite
customer_reviews.text: I have used all kinds of eye lash makeup and I love this one. It stays on even without it being water proof but comes off when you want easily. The brush makes it really easy to put on and not get glumpy. Overall a great product for the money.
customer_reviews.author: Rhapsody

customer_reviews.title: FAKE PRODUCT
customer_reviews.text: Yes, like everyone is saying this is a fake product, and you're paying for the real deal. I'm surprised Amazon is continuing to use this seller after all the other reviews of this not being the authentic product. I've been using They're Real mascara by Benefit for many years now and could tell this was a cheaply made look alike right away. If you compare the brushes they are nothing alike. Will never be buying from this seller again.
customer_reviews.author: E. Patrick

customer_reviews.title: Fake product
customer_reviews.text: I've been using this mascara for years and I know what the consistency is supposed to be like. Red flags: the box was taped shut, the tube's font was slightly thicker than what the original font is like (I put them side by side), and most importantly, the mascara is not as thick and VERY runny when I wash my face. The authentic product never did that. Worst of all, the skin around my eyes reacted - it was red and very sensitive for a few days. I will never buy this off Amazon again. Will only go to a Benefit bar at Macy's, Sephora, or Ulta. LESSON LEARNED.
customer_reviews.author: Christine M. Reyes

customer_reviews.title: NOT real!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: This is absolutely not authentic Benefit mascara! I've been using this exact mascara purchased from Sephora for the past 6 years, so I would know. It had a very bad smell, was stringy and goopy when coming out of the tube, and would not dry on eyelashes! It would literally get all over my skin from blinking my eyes. My eyes also had a weird burning feeling when it was on. I'm so disgusted by the fact that they can get away with selling this crap! And, apparently I'm not able to get any sort of refund. What a scam!
customer_reviews.author: Summer Mast

customer_reviews.title: Good product,  but old and seller sent me dried out version!
customer_reviews.text: Not sure how old this product was when I bought it, but.. horrible. Clumped, dry... not good. I've bought this before with no problems but whichever seller sold it... held onto it for a while. Super dried out. Disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: cindy

customer_reviews.title: Best Mascara ever made!
customer_reviews.text: *I discovered this about three years ago and cannot even entertain the idea of another product. It's perfect! It builds , doesn't clump, doesn't draw off anywhere else under your eye. Best mascara ever made in my opinion
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Just okay
customer_reviews.text: I wanted to like this mascara, but it came up short. It is very difficult to remove even with eye makeup remover and soap. Also it doesn’t separate lashes so they end up looking sparce and wimpy.
customer_reviews.author: Amfriday

customer_reviews.title: Great mascara but hard to clean off completely with remover.
customer_reviews.text: Love this mascara! My lashes have never been mistaken for extensions but it works to add thickness and length to in apply layers. It usually lasts all day without “dropping”. I do have to use makeup remover to get it off...soap and water won’t do. If you try to reapply the next day without removing it will get clumpy.
customer_reviews.author: jens

customer_reviews.title: I'm pleased with this mascara overall
customer_reviews.text: I'm pleased with this mascara overall. Is Benefit Cosmetics a trusted brand? Yes. Do I think this mascara is totally worth the cost?...Eh I'm not too sold. I will say this is basically the LEAST clumpy mascara I've ever used. So for that, it's been excellent. I really have no qualms whatsoever with the product, and I'll say this is a repeat buy for me as well. But, I still feel it's a little upmarked on the price...
customer_reviews.author: sarah schmitz

customer_reviews.title: It's not cheap but it is amazing and worth
customer_reviews.text: OK first off I have tried ever mascara out there and this is the SH$T!!! It's not cheap but it is amazing and worth it
customer_reviews.author: tigerboy

customer_reviews.title: Clumpy & wet
customer_reviews.text: This is difficult to set, very wet application. However, once it sets it is difficult to remove with macara remover. If you seat or cry it comes off immediley and you have a black messy face. Never again.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Middle

customer_reviews.title: Really lengthens lashes, and stays on!
customer_reviews.text: I am picky about mascara. I won't use products that flake off and I want to see my lashes grow long and thick when I put the mascara on. So far, this product is everything I'm looking for at a good price.
customer_reviews.author: Bambi Pup

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: I had chemotherapy and started to lose my eyelashes so I bought this to lengthen and fill in what little I had left. I was happy with the results. It gave the illusion of fuller, longer lashes.
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: They have changed something !
customer_reviews.text: I have been using this mascara for years .. I do not know if they changed the formula or what .. but it doesn’t cover my lashes like it use to .. seems much thinner and the wand is weird too .. very disappointed but it would cost more to ship back .. I guess I need to find a new mascara :(
customer_reviews.author: Kelley Stapleton

customer_reviews.title: Benefit mascara was not up to par because it must've been old or exposed to heat.
customer_reviews.text: I believe that I would have like it better had it mot been old because the consistency of the product was stringy. I thought maybe that's what it was supposed to be like until I ordered a smaller tube and the consistency is totally different. I think that I should receive another tube of the benefits mascara. Thank you.
customer_reviews.author: AS

customer_reviews.title: They're (NOT) Real
customer_reviews.text: I have used Benefit's "They're Real" mascara for a couple years now. After buying this product from this particular seller, I realized that it was not the real Benefit's brand. The mascara was very stringy coming out of the tube and did not work as well as the real one. The mascara came off in strings like dried glue. I also noticed that the label was not straight, as if someone carelessly put Benefits label on it. Although its cheaper than the original product, it does not work as well.
customer_reviews.author: Skyler

customer_reviews.title: ... several websites claiming it to be one of the best mascaras out there
customer_reviews.text: I bought this product as it was reviewed reviewed by several websites claiming it to be one of the best mascaras out there. Apart from no clumping it is useless. I apply it over and over and over and you can hardly tell I have any mascara on. VERY disappointed in this product and wish people would accurately review items so others do not waste their money.
customer_reviews.author: Kimberly Young

customer_reviews.title: Best mascara
customer_reviews.text: This mascara is the bomb! Goes on easily, no clumping. Last quite a long time. Easy to remove. I’ve used a lot of different brands and this one is by far the best.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Best mascara
customer_reviews.text: Best mascara I’ve ever used. Makes my lashes long dark and thick
customer_reviews.author: Sarah T

customer_reviews.title: I won't use anything else.
customer_reviews.text: I love the brush on this mascara. I won't use any other mascara.
customer_reviews.author: Jane Brambilla

customer_reviews.title: Contact wear will love this.
customer_reviews.text: I wear contacts this product does not flake. Have used this product many years now. It helpful to use a eye makeup remover to clean off
customer_reviews.author: smiley clover

customer_reviews.title: Worth the price for great lashes!
customer_reviews.text: My new favorite mascara. I got a sample in my Ipsy bag and loved the way it coated and madd my lashes look. It doesn't flake after all day wear either. Love it!
customer_reviews.author: sharon smith

customer_reviews.title: Poor Poor quality
customer_reviews.text: Not the quality product I expected. In garbage, and will never order again. For the cost $21, I did not get the use out of this product. Every time I used it I had to wipe tiny pieces of the brush hair from the mascara. Applying it was not easy, and it was most times TOO wet, clumpy, smudged or flaked. Maybe spoiled or old from the day it shipped.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Best mascara ever
customer_reviews.text: Difficult to remove but it’s amazing! Only mascara I will use. It does come off easily with philosophy purity cleanser.
customer_reviews.author: Jerry R. Riley

customer_reviews.title: Fake.
customer_reviews.text: I wish I read the reviews before purchasing! I’ve always bought this brand mascara from ultra so I can say with confidence this is not the same thing. Very dissapointed.
customer_reviews.author: Jackie

customer_reviews.title: I was fooled
customer_reviews.text: I loved this mascara until I bought it here. I agree with so many......not the real thing. Very disappointed as I purchased two thinking it was like I bought from Birchbox.
customer_reviews.author: Judy Potapa

customer_reviews.title: Trash. Better to buy from known stores.
customer_reviews.text: This seller is trash. Th~~Ive bought this brand before from a dept store and it wore overnight without running or smearing. It also applied tubular to my lashes giving full coverage and also washed off tubular.
customer_reviews.author: Tumbleweed83

customer_reviews.title: WONDER IF THIS WAS AN ATTEMPT AT A KNOCKOFF?
customer_reviews.text: I've used this mascara for years, but the formula in this order was very different. The best way to describe the formula is stringy. It just sat on the lashes not thickening and lengthening as it always has in the past. I wonder if I bought a counterfeit. Packaging looked right, but I didn't open it til 6 weeks after purchasing so couldnt return it. Won't buy here again.
customer_reviews.author: Tina

customer_reviews.title: Want longer looking eyelashes!  Buy this!
customer_reviews.text: Where all of the time and really was more convenient than going to the store to pick up. Love the length it gives to my lashes!
customer_reviews.author: CH

customer_reviews.title: Not they’re real
customer_reviews.text: I have been using they’re real for six years, and love it! By far my favorite mascara, unfortunately the tube I received is not they’re real, it does not even compare with the tubes I have had in the past.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Scam. Completely FAKE.
customer_reviews.text: SCAM. This is completely FAKE! I compared it to my Benefit mascara from Ulta and they are definitely not the same. The bottles look different. The one I received flakes off and comes right off when wet. The real one is waterproof. The mascara I got from here is a different consistency as well. DON'T waste your money. It's a scam!!
customer_reviews.author: AmazonE

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality
customer_reviews.text: Been wearing this mascara for years and love it, but first time buying on Amazon and the consistentcy of the mascara that I received is not right. It literally comes off my lashes like paint wash off a brush, all clumpy. Threw the box out upon receipt so can’t return. Went to mall and bought another which of course was fine.
customer_reviews.author: melissa s.

customer_reviews.title: This the best mascara I've ever used
customer_reviews.text: This the best mascara I've ever used. But - you have to be sure to get it all off at night.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: THIS IS A FAKE PRODUCT!!!
customer_reviews.text: This is a counterfeit product. Have used They're Real (purchased from Ulta) for years. Unlike the real product, this product has a very flimsy brush and the mascara itself is gluey and makes lashes so hard that they actually hurt. Terrible fake fake fake!!!
customer_reviews.author: Shoeluvr

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: My mom loves now. It’s her new favorite after I got this for her as a gift.
customer_reviews.author: Lindsey Rieser

customer_reviews.title: Just like at Ulta, no difference
customer_reviews.text: I've used this product for a few years now and it never disappoints! I love it. I usually purchase it at ulta but couldn't get there this last time so I tried Amazon and it's the same product they have.
customer_reviews.author: cynthia c banta

customer_reviews.title: Had to Cancel
customer_reviews.text: I should’ve read the reviews first!!!!!!!!!! this project is apparently fake,,,,, I canceled purchase as soon as I could
customer_reviews.author: fiona london

customer_reviews.title: Mascara for people with no time to waste.
customer_reviews.text: It's the best ever mascara. I've tried them all and nothing compares.
customer_reviews.author: De Ce

customer_reviews.title: FAKE PRODUCT
customer_reviews.text: Definitely not the real product. I have used this mascara for years and this one was clearly cheaply made. It barely applied anything to the lash and had a flimsy brush that was WAY different from the real brush (left mascara all over unwanted areas near the lash). It also flaked off throughout the day. TERRIBLE PRODUCT.
customer_reviews.author: Meagan

customer_reviews.title: This is NOT A Real Benefit product
customer_reviews.text: This is not a real benefit product. The packaging is very similar but the product is not. It smudge, runs,, flakes and made my eyes burn. Do not purchase this.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Something is definitely not right with this product!!
customer_reviews.text: I have used this product for years and I know this isn't real when it flakes and comes off with my Cetaphil face wash, I have always had to use makeup remover. As you can see bottle is chipped and it come out of bottle with a stringy consistency!! What kind of deal is this? I feel like someone refilled and sold?? I will be returning.
customer_reviews.author: Wanda Lee Kehoe

customer_reviews.title: Fake
customer_reviews.text: This is a fake product. I’ve been using this product for 5+ years. The labeling seemed off to me at first. Then when the product started coming off in tubes, much different than the real product. I then looked at the website on the labeling and realized it was definitely fake.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: FAKE!!!
customer_reviews.text: This is a total fake! Not the same as original product I bought from the store. It’s obvious it’s a fake. Bottle feels different, brush is smaller and looks so cheap in comparison. Mascara clumps off when I wash it off. Glad I paid full price for $2.00 mascara
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love - must try
customer_reviews.text: Hard to remove but extends and lashes look fantastic in pictures. Love the brush
customer_reviews.author: LeAnne Miley

customer_reviews.title: Wasted my $
customer_reviews.text: I have purchased this mascara many times from Ulta. I opened this tube and it was completely dried out. Very disappointed. Now I have to go to Ulta and repurchase it.
customer_reviews.author: Julie Kemp

customer_reviews.title: Not new
customer_reviews.text: I have used this product before and love it. What I received was not new or in original packaging. It appears to be dried and old.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great product, great service!
customer_reviews.text: Great product, I’ve ordered and used this product many times.
customer_reviews.author: Old Time Alaskan

customer_reviews.title: Pretty good mascara!
customer_reviews.text: Love the brush bristles, although wish the wand was longer. At first it wasn’t the best, like most mascaras, but after a week or so it glides on lovely.
customer_reviews.author: Pazabled

customer_reviews.title: Amazing Mascara
customer_reviews.text: This mascara is amazing!! It makes my eyelashes look so long and beautiful and it lasts throughout the whole day. I love it and would highly recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Elin

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Purchased as a stocking stuffer for my daughter, who loves it!
customer_reviews.author: Susan S

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: Never used this product before but thought I’d give it a shot.... DONT. It doesn’t lengthen at all. Drug store mascara is better. Very disappointed
customer_reviews.author: Jerrod Martin

customer_reviews.title: Disappointing
customer_reviews.text: Very brittle. Clumpy. Did not lengthen at all. Pieces of the mascara kept falling off and sticking to my face.
customer_reviews.author: Miki Brugge

customer_reviews.title: Not So Real
customer_reviews.text: The eyelashes may be real but this order was not. The consistency of the mascara was a strange and the brush wasn’t the correct design. I purchased a new one from Sephora to confirm and sure enough they were not the same. Do not buy from this seller. It’s a fake.
customer_reviews.author: Hannah

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: It is nice and thick and makes lashes show up well.
customer_reviews.author: Kay

customer_reviews.title: A Quality Product
customer_reviews.text: This is a great product. I've been using it for a couple of years. Separates and lengthens without clumping, and lasts until it's taken off.
customer_reviews.author: T. Stone

customer_reviews.title: This is my go to mascara! It makes my ...
customer_reviews.text: This is my go to mascara! It makes my lashes long and thick, and people often ask if I'm wearing falsies, but no 'They're real!'
customer_reviews.author: Kelci Lourido

customer_reviews.title: Not right for me.
customer_reviews.text: Not my favorite mascara, it is sticky. My lashes would stick together during the day.
customer_reviews.author: RLHarmon

customer_reviews.title: This mascara wasn't for me, it smeared all under ...
customer_reviews.text: This mascara wasn't for me, it smeared all under my eyes, and felt heavy and clumpy. I was excited to try it after reading some reviews online, but it didn't work out for me.
customer_reviews.author: Wanda M.

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: My daughter gave this to me for a Christmas gift and I loved the way it worked so had to get it for myself when I ran out!
customer_reviews.author: Marguerite F.

customer_reviews.title: My fav!
customer_reviews.text: My favorite mascara! Adds length and volume without looking overdone.
customer_reviews.author: Dana H

customer_reviews.title: Won’t order again
customer_reviews.text: Was not in original packaging and the mascara was dry!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Best mascara I have had in 15 years
customer_reviews.text: This mascara separates every lash and makes them super long!
customer_reviews.author: stephanie allen

customer_reviews.title: The brush is deformed
customer_reviews.text: The brush is messed up, no bristles on the end..
customer_reviews.author: Kelly L.

customer_reviews.title: They are real!
customer_reviews.text: This mascara really does elongate my eyelashes. People really do ask me if they’re “real.”
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Best Masacra
customer_reviews.text: One of the best mascaras I’ve ever own!!! Better than Sephora!!!
customer_reviews.author: :::AliNa:::

customer_reviews.title: Fake Product
customer_reviews.text: I really think this product is fake and I would like a refund. I have the original mascara and its nothing like that. Thank you.
customer_reviews.author: JNKB

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Gives you great, full, long lashes. It really is as good as wearing falsies.
customer_reviews.author: ts75

customer_reviews.title: Long Lasting
customer_reviews.text: Stays on forever and never smudges. One of the bests mascara’s I’ve ever used.
customer_reviews.author: Nikki

customer_reviews.title: Thick long lashes and it doesn’t run!
customer_reviews.text: Love it! Doesn’t run and make my eyelashes really long!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Bought because it was highly recommended. It was very disappointing
customer_reviews.text: Bought because it was highly recommended. It was very disappointing. Very gummy and sticky. It also made my lashes brittle.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Came from different company and not same quality as original purchase. This one cheaply made.
customer_reviews.author: K.J.

customer_reviews.title: FAKE!
customer_reviews.text: I wish I could give 0 stars. Smells like gasoline. very similar packaging to actual Benefit mascara but wand and formula of mascara is clearly different.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not good purchase
customer_reviews.text: This mascara seems empty like there is no mascara in the tube. Disappointing purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Dorothy Russo

customer_reviews.title: Purchase at store!
customer_reviews.text: Terrible! Had to return this item. Arrived just a tube of mascara not in usual box from manufacturer. Product was drier than the one I was replacing.
customer_reviews.author: Becky

customer_reviews.title: FAKE!!!
customer_reviews.text: says benefitcosmetios.com on back. scared of even trying to use.

customer_reviews.title: Love, love
customer_reviews.text: This mascara is my ride or die. Love, love, LOVE it!

customer_reviews.title: Bone dry
customer_reviews.text: I was excited to try this mascara but I was quickly disappointed , it is bone dry ,
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great product.
customer_reviews.text: Best mascara I've ever used. Long wear, no smudging, perfect applicator.

customer_reviews.title: Waste of time/money
customer_reviews.text: Took way to long....box was damaged/opened and it look used
customer_reviews.author: TMH

customer_reviews.title: KNOCK OFF
customer_reviews.text: Different then the actua product. Packaging and quality is different. Do not buy here
customer_reviews.author: Rachel

customer_reviews.title: Great mascara!
customer_reviews.text: I have purchased many and this is by far the best one!
customer_reviews.author: Avid Shopper

customer_reviews.title: Nothing special
customer_reviews.text: It really isn't a bad product. I just don't see why it was quadruple the price of my usual mascara. I wanted to try something different but the end result didn't really appear any different. I did like the brush and consistancy of the product which didn't clump at all and applied very evenely but I don't see myself buying it again.
customer_reviews.author: Lowe Family

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Favorite mascara I’ve ever used! I’ve tried so many and nothing compares!
customer_reviews.author: Nicole Fleming

customer_reviews.title: FAKE!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: This is not the real mascara! It left me with swollen eyes and the product is awful!!!!!

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Favorite mascara to use! Makes your eyelashes look really long!!!
customer_reviews.author: Rachael

customer_reviews.title: Better than my usual mascara
customer_reviews.text: Better than my usual mascara, but not as AMAZING as all the hype had me expecting me it was going to be. Also not quite worth the price. Doesn't look like you have fake lashes on, but four stars because it's still a decent mascara
customer_reviews.author: kaitlin

customer_reviews.title: This one is by far the best! No clumps
customer_reviews.text: I’ve practically have purchased every mascara on the market and all I ever got was clumping. This one is by far the best! No clumps. Separates my lashes and makes them look fuller and thicker. I don’t have to look any further I found my forever mascara!
customer_reviews.author: kathy copeland

customer_reviews.title: is not the same quality as the identical product ordered ...
customer_reviews.text: is not the same quality as the identical product ordered from another supplier. Runny, messy and doesn't not perform the same on lashes as before.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Too clumpy
customer_reviews.text: This mascara does make my lashes look long, but it's seriously clumpy and unnatural looking. Great for a spidery, Twiggy 60s look, but not for a clean, refined work look.
customer_reviews.author: Laurel Duvall

customer_reviews.title: My favorite masacara
customer_reviews.text: I went from using 6 different mascaras (I really like masacara) to just 2 after getting this. I love long and thick lashes. they're Real gives you major length. Combine this with Too Faced mascara and people will ask you if you have falsies
customer_reviews.author: KaiB

product_meta.title: Benefit Cosmetics They're Real Beyond Mascara Black .3 Ounce
product_meta.description: Long-wearing formula. Dries glossy. Exclusive brush designed with a combination of short and long bristles. Coats lashes for the look of length and definition.
feature_bullets: A lengthening mascara that curls, volumizes, lifts, and separates lashes
With its glossy, jet-black, long-wearing formula, you’ll flaunt luxurious, silky lashes that won’t smudge, clump, or dry out
The specially designed brush features staggered bristles that grab close to the root, boosting length and volume beyond belief
The custom-domed tip uses precision bristles to lift, define, and curl even your tiniest lashes
Reveals lashes you never knew you had!
